comment._content: I've never heard of auto polo so this is amazing.  I can't imagine doing anything like it.  I wonder how much damage the cars received in just one match?  With my luck I would get thrown out of the auto and run over by the other one.  Way to dangerous for me.

comment.author: 30552029@N00
comment._content: How is this not an Olympic sport? A couple of tiny monopostos, football helmet, a basketball, some croquet mallets, and you've got the perfect blend of sport that encapsulates the spirit of competition with the manliness of bullfighting. The planning of a rainy day reverie gone haywire.
